ComicInfo.Summary: Andrew Bennett arrives at the Hall of Justice to bring warning of an uprising of vampires that plan to wipe out the human race.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 02:38:19. [CVDB891115] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:48:51. [Issue ID 2270945]

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Daniel Warren Johnson,Ejikure,Francesco Mattina,Jorge Molina,Otto Schmidt

ComicInfo.Teams: Vampires,Justice League of America,Legion of Doom
